channel.title: [SHOWOFF] Simple Sword
channel.description:
Hey guys. today i'm going to show you my newest sword (:
Renders. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/23s7wbp.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/25pk5mo.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/mbismh.jpg[/img]
Wireframe. [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/23lcwoi.png[/img]
rate 1/10, flame with a reason and say what i can improve & vote in the poll for release.

item.title: [SHOWOFF] Simple Sword
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

The handle could definitely use a bit of a width/height adjustment, it seems far to skinny and long for the length of the blade.

Read full topic

item.title: [SHOWOFF] Simple Sword
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

h1 sk1ller:

[quote]thats because your an immature little 12 year old…or maybe 8 years old

Did you never here me say that it’s an honest opinion? Wow nice work dude!! It’s fucking awesome 10\10 greatteessst jobbb eevvvvvvvverrrrrrrrrrrrr!!! ;D ;D ;D

are you fucking happy now? Does that make you feel nice for me to lie about it? Then whatever kid…

Like I said before h1’s siggy matches him self, he is a flamer and a troll.

The model its self is nice but next time take pictures before you triangular it, so faggots like h1 don’t come and flame over it. For the ball thing I would of personally made it have the glow effect, but as little as it is I don’t think it would of mattered in game lol. I rate a 8/10 for a first.

Whatever krackkid… I am not a troller or a flamer, I just hate certain things, look!! Fucking hell, I said 1 thing, an honest opinion and you guys fucking make it x1000 times worse!! It is always started like this, just because I’m actually honest, do you want me to lie at everything? You guys wanted me to handle contrusctive criticism when I got on theese forums!! But then when I say it has too many polygons and just being honest you guys fucking flame me so hard when it was just an opinion!!! Stop fucking creating bigger problems!! Is this why every other flame war has started? Well here’s the solution, just stop bagging my opinions please!! Fucking hell…[/quote]So i herd u wer liek nerd raging oder bin gay

Read full topic

item.title: [SHOWOFF] Simple Sword
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

reyx7:

Replying to badger (on my itouch, itouch users will understand) I think it’s in that short sword length. Lengthening might give it a 2h feel.

the overall thickness of the sword needs to be increased as well, it just seems really thin and fragile at this point.

Read full topic

item.title: [SHOWOFF] Simple Sword
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Replying to badger (on my itouch, itouch users will understand) I think it’s in that short sword length. Lengthening might give it a 2h feel.

Read full topic

item.title: [SHOWOFF] Simple Sword
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:10, topic:365290”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=461494.msg3376417#msg3376417 date=1287635349]
H1 your an asshole. Why must you insist on insulting people who recolor, then the people who actually attempt to model get insulted just as much. What the hell is it that makes you happy? Its a great first attempt so leave the poor kid alone.
[/quote]

I still told him it was a goodjob are you blind? XD I said I’m sorry but thats honest, do you want me to lie?[/quote]

honest opinion or not, you can still tell him what YOU think he can improve on it, thats called constructive criticism, telling him its a piece of crap doesnt help him at all to improve his view on modeling and what he can do to improve in the future. GIVE HIM TIPS OF IMPROVEMENT.

as for the flame war before my post and after it, shut the fuck up and take it to PM.

OT: i like the sword, but it seems a bit small, it would do better as somewhat of a dagger. Thicken it up a bit and the blade should have only been 1 segment, if you know what i mean. Good job though.

Read full topic

item.title: [SHOWOFF] Simple Sword
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

h1 sk1ller:

[quote]thats because your an immature little 12 year old…or maybe 8 years old

Did you never here me say that it’s an honest opinion? Wow nice work dude!! It’s fucking awesome 10\10 greatteessst jobbb eevvvvvvvverrrrrrrrrrrrr!!! ;D ;D ;D

are you fucking happy now? Does that make you feel nice for me to lie about it? Then whatever kid…

Like I said before h1’s siggy matches him self, he is a flamer and a troll.

The model its self is nice but next time take pictures before you triangular it, so faggots like h1 don’t come and flame over it. For the ball thing I would of personally made it have the glow effect, but as little as it is I don’t think it would of mattered in game lol. I rate a 8/10 for a first.

Whatever krackkid… I am not a troller or a flamer, I just hate certain things, look!! Fucking hell, I said 1 thing, an honest opinion and you guys fucking make it x1000 times worse!! It is always started like this, just because I’m actually honest, do you want me to lie at everything? You guys wanted me to handle contrusctive criticism when I got on theese forums!! But then when I say it has too many polygons and just being honest you guys fucking flame me so hard when it was just an opinion!!! Stop fucking creating bigger problems!! Is this why every other flame war has started? Well here’s the solution, just stop bagging my opinions please!! Fucking hell…[/quote]
honestly, i have to agree with krackkid, you put that as your sig? and yet you troll, from a few observations, ive only seen you not flame or troll reyx7, rixx or dylan’s models, anyone else’s is officially crap in your view, you dont even give starters a chance, if it doesnt have your stamp of approval, its crap.shit.worthless. just like you flamed iatachi like 50 times on his post, dont like it?stop posting? this is a first model…

WTF for a peice of crap like that? I'm sorry dude but it really doesn't need that many polygons XD but I guess it's okay..
sorry reyx, i know we have been getting out of hand, but honestly, i have just been holding this in so long from just looking through these forums, and i had to say it thats not critisising at all! "i guess its okay...." doesnt make up for "WTF for a peice of crap like that? I'm sorry dude but it really doesn't need that many polygons" you learn from your mistakes, but apparently sk1ller, you have not learned that and you dont let anyone else learn from their first mistakes, first time has to be a godlike professional model or gtfo.... on topic, i like the hilt, i like the concept and color! try making the hand guard smoother and more curved, its too... uhh.... it looks too unrealistic, but ill give you props for the hilt

Read full topic

item.title: [SHOWOFF] Simple Sword
item.dc:creator: @tubefish tubefish
item.description:
@tubefish wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:17, topic:365290”][quote author=mongoth666 link=topic=461494.msg3376482#msg3376482 date=1287646293]

H1 your an asshole. Why must you insist on insulting people who recolor, then the people who actually attempt to model get insulted just as much. What the hell is it that makes you happy? Its a great first attempt so leave the poor kid alone.

I still told him it was a goodjob are you blind? XD I said I’m sorry but thats honest, do you want me to lie?

im guessing you are blind too?
read this, this is a C&P from your previous post “WTF for a peice of crap like that?”
well?
you couldof posted some constructive critisisim, but NO. you just had to flame.
your posts dont seem to be helping anyone (in a good way) imagine if you releaced a new sword, and then i came along and went (without taking much notice of what you actually made)
“OMG IT SUCKS, GTFO, i dont like ur style of modeling, i can do much better because im H1 SK1LLER.”
yeah, thats just not cool.

ANYWAY.
ontopic: well looking at your wireframe (im hoping your reading this H1) you could entirely get rid of the bottom orb and replace it with 2 spheres inside eachother, and deleate sections of the outer sphere, so that it shows sections of the inside sphere, giving the same effect as what you have done now.
over all, the blade is good, its low poly and has no funky faces (well, from the pictures you have provided)
but yeah, the bottom part of the hilt would never be seen in its fullest, so i would recomend making it either:
A: bigger
B: doing what i said for you to do above (with the 2 spheres)
c: just make it 1 glowing sphere

~ shrogg

I’m not that self centered and my faggotness level isn’t that high, like that word? Faggotness, anyway, I could help him but I said it as my honest opinion of what I thought, as I said before, and I’ll say it again, do you want me to lie? If not then just let me be honest, all critics are honest…

This is pretty much why you got banned for trolling on R-L >_>

Chill bro, he’s probably new to modeling, but if he’s not try to say something other than negative opinions… I like the alpha effect he put at the bottom of the hilt (though easy to make but makes it look better)

But bro, i’ve moved away from RSPS modelling and moved on to making models for my oblivion client. MUCH more complex and challenging. If you suppose your that good, try doing that… Don’t bother the new people >_>

(i do still model SOMETIMES when im bored for RSPS’s)

I’m exactly the same as you dude, except not oblivion, but like I don’t model for RSPS unless I’m bored XD sorry for posting an honest comment… I’m so fucking sorry!! Just stop making it worse, it was an honest opinion and you just fucking blow it out of the water… I’m not even mad…

Alright… But you should try learning to put models into oblivion clients.
[/quote]

I don’t even know what the hell oblivion is XD[/quote]

thats because your an immature little 12 year old…or maybe 8 years old

Read full topic
